sentences.en: a conducted tour of Berlin
sentences.cn: 在导游陪同下的柏林之行

sentences.en: Aluminium, being a metal, readily conducts heat .
sentences.cn: 铝这种金属导热性能很好。

sentences.en: an inquiry into the conduct of the police
sentences.cn: 对警方行为的调查

sentences.en: From beginning to end his conduct had been despicable and wicked.
sentences.cn: 从头到尾他的行为既卑鄙又可恶.

sentences.en: He was also fined $150 for unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 他还因行为违反了职业道德而被罚150美元。

sentences.en: his arrest for disorderly conduct
sentences.cn: 他因妨害治安行为而遭逮捕

sentences.en: I deliberated with him on his future course of conduct.
sentences.cn: 我和他一起讨论他将来的行动方针.

sentences.en: I was called to account for my conduct by the headmistress.
sentences.cn: 我因为行为不检点而受到女校长的斥责.

sentences.en: In most of the residence halls we visited, rules prohibit disorderly conduct.
sentences.cn: 在我们走访的学生宿舍里，大多明令禁止胡作非为。

sentences.en: It was the first time that I had conducted business in Brazil.
sentences.cn: 那是我第一次在巴西做生意。

sentences.en: It's about time you gave over that kind of conduct.
sentences.cn: 该停止做那种事了.

sentences.en: Several colleges in our study have rigid rules about student conduct.
sentences.cn: 在我们的研究中，有几所大学制定了严格的学生行为规则。

sentences.en: She was found guilty of unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 她因违反职业道德而被判罪。

sentences.en: Solti will continue to conduct here and abroad.
sentences.cn: 索尔蒂将继续在国内外担任指挥。

sentences.en: The evaluation of conduct involves some amount of generalization.
sentences.cn: 对操行的评价会含有一些泛泛之论。

sentences.en: The memorial service was conducted by the Rev. David Prior.
sentences.cn: 这次追悼仪式由戴维·普赖尔牧师主持。

sentences.en: The new code of conduct lays down the ground rules for management-union relations.
sentences.cn: 新的行为规范确定了资方与工会关系的基本原则。

sentences.en: The newspaper breached the code of conduct on privacy.
sentences.cn: 该报违反了保护隐私的行为准则。

sentences.en: The orchestra is conducted by John Williams.
sentences.cn: 这支管弦乐队由约翰•威廉斯指挥。

sentences.en: The Senator’s conduct is being investigated by the Ethics Committee.
sentences.cn: 该参议员的行为正受到道德委员会的调查。

sentences.en: The teacher was dismissed from his post for unprofessional conduct.
sentences.cn: 这名教师因其行为违反职业道德而被解职.

sentences.en: to conduct a campaign
sentences.cn: 领导一场运动

sentences.en: Who will be conducting?
sentences.cn: 由谁来指挥？

sentences.en: You will have to answer me for your conduct.
sentences.cn: 你为你的行为要向我负责.

words.tran_cn: 传导的；传导性的；有传导力的
导电性；[物][生理] 传导性
导体；售票员；领导者；管理人
女向导；女车长；女指挥；女售票员

phrases.tran_cn: 扰乱社会治安的行为，妨碍治安行为

trans.tran_en: the way someone behaves, especially in public, in their job etc

trans.tran_cn: 进行，组织，实施，表现，举止，指挥，传导（热或电），带领
trans.tran_en: if something conducts electricity or heat, it allows electricity or heat to travel along or through it

trans.tran_cn: 进行， 管理， 操控； 指挥， 引导； 输送， 传导； 表现
trans.tran_en: to stand in front of a group of musicians or singers and direct their playing or singing
